> extremely
> > rare occurrence to have both meters trigger at the same time. This

> meter
> > triggering have occurred using the natural trifield meter. This has
> > happened only a couple of times and at only 1 location, but it has
> made the
> > purchase price worth while for me.

> gives

> >

> > with the MEL's backlight on, you may be more focused on the meter's
> readings
> > during an investigation in the dark (your eyes are naturally drawn
> towards
> > the light) than on the surrounding area which is a big no-no because
